Header: Import levy on big onions slashed
Content: The Ministry of Agriculture says that measures have been taken to slash the import levy on Big Onions. The government announces that the import levy on one kilogram of big onion will be cut by 39 rupees. The new measures will be in effect from midnight today. Minister of Agriculture P. Harrison stated that this decision was taken to ease the cost of living of the consumers as the price of Big Onions was increased recently.
